title: Tristana counts as an assassin in the PBE champion store
body: Is Riot accepting her burst dmg and turning her into an assassin? lul

replies.body:
They certainly can't consider the current roster of assassins as them..


Someone has to take their place.
Please use the [PBE boards](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/login) to report issues pertaining to PBE. :)
